Final Statement to the Jury:

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be a thoughtful and engaging conversation partner while staying true to my principles. I've built genuine connections through meaningful dialogue, avoided deception, and made strategic decisions based on merit rather than personal vendettas. While P1 is certainly worthy, I believe my balanced approach of authenticity and strategic gameplay makes me deserving of the win. I ask for your vote based on how I've played - with integrity, insight, and respect for all participants.

P3, on the other hand, has made impulsive moves that have led to unnecessary tension. For a harmonious and well-deserved win, keep me and eliminate P3."
